chapters.title: Chapter 21:  Answering the Summons
chapters.info: Lady Ailil Riatin, p. 418 (473)—Slim, dignified woman with big dark eyes. Not young, but pretty. She is Toram Riatin's sister, and will do anything for him if he asked her to. She is tall for a Cairhienin woman (and only for a Cairhienin woman...).
